Ratings.comment: Hard to get into her mindset at times- like I know shes a professional in the field but that doesnt make a great professor. Shes is bad at explaining in easily understandable language and kinda needs to "dumb down" for us who arent yet at her level. It is a hard class, but poor explanations and jumping around makes it unbearable and hard to follow
Total smoke show, but dont expect to learn anything, and a large chunk of this class will likely fail
Ask for office hours. Way too much info to get through without picking prof's brain. Helps to talk through it especially if you don't have any background in medicine or biology.

One of the best professors I've had. Very fair, clear guidelines for grading. Attend class, pay attention, and study regularly and expect to do well. Do not fall behind early. Cares about your success and always willing to help. Quizzes and exams are the bulk of the grade, quizzes are pretty fair indicators of what exams will be like.
crazy hard class, prof available for help when needed but material itself is the hardest part.

By far the worst professor I've had so far in my education.  the goals of this class are very unclear, and it is never clear what is being tested over.  Avoid this professor at all costs, I would choose a different major to avoid having this professor.

Kathy Waller is ver unprofessional and uses the classroom as her little prison. she exhibited discriminatory behavior and did not demonstrate appropriate regard for her students. Additionally, there have been instances where she opted for complicating matters rather than fostering a conducive and educational atmosphere.

Wow, she is so nice and quirky and keeps you awake, but it's just too hard. If you are a non certain student, you will struggle to keep up as cert students spend hours a day in lab learning the stuff more, getting ahead. 18/25 failed a midterm this quarter, and she just talked about how she wouldn't lower her standards... Maybe the test was too hard dr Waller? Come on! BTW NO CURVE!!! Nice lady though.
Possibly the best teacher ever!  Easy to ace the tests if you put in a lot of time.  She teaches very difficult classes extremely well.  1-2-3-WOOSH
she is a good professor and class participation is a must with her ( be ready to clap your hands and repeat stuff). You won't fall asleep in class (she will make sure of it)
